name: Pre-Registration
description: The potential accountholder is currently being created and has not fully completed the process.

name: Active
description: The accountholder is active in our system. But some information is unverified (eg: email or phone).

name: Live
description: The account is active and live in our system. The Accountholder verified all information and can access the system (this is separate from being able to use a card, which requires funding activation).

name: Archived (Removed)
description: The accountholder has been archived on our system and is no longer accessible through the API or UI.

name: Deactivated
description: The accountholder has been deactivated. A deactivated accountholder can be reinstated. While deactivated, all card transactions will fail.

name: Hold
description: The accountholder has been placed on hold. The purpose of this status is to allow further review of KYC (Know-Your-Customer) submissions.
